contentrichtext.text: '''Nagaoka''' may refer to: ==Places== * [[Nagaoka, Niigata]], Japan * [[Nagaoka-kyō]], the capital of Japan from 784 to 794 ** [[Nagaokakyō, Kyoto]], Japan, a city at the location of Nagaoka-kyō * [[Izunagaoka, Shizuoka]], Japan, a former town in [[Izu Peninsula]] ==People== * [[Hantaro Nagaoka]] (長岡 半太郎, 1865–1950), Japanese physicist responsible for the 1904 "Saturnian" model of atomic structure ==Other== *[[Nagaoka (crater)]], a lunar crater named after Hantaro Nagaoka {{disambiguation}} [[Category:Surnames]]
